summary:
A collection of 16 Decorative Shields primarily intended as Wall Mounted decorations using 

Shield attachment points in player Homes.
Could be used as Ornamental Shields in Battle too, if the player wished.
Are craftable at Forges & Smithable at Armor Tables.
descriptionHtml:
A collection of 16 Decorative Shields primarily intended as Wall Mounted decorations using 
Shield attachment points in player Homes.
Could be used as Ornamental Shields in Battle too, if the player wished.
Are craftable at Forges & Smithable at Armor Tables.
All require 4x Steel Ingots, 2x Leather & 2x Leather Strips to Craft at a Forge.
All require 1x Steel Ingot to improve at an Armor Table.

Collection includes:

1. Shield_of_Dibella_1
2. Shield_of_Nocturnal_1
3. Wall_MTD_Draugr_Flames_1
4. Wall_MTD_Draugr_ICE_1
5. Wall_MTD_Draugr_Shock_1
6. Wall_MTD_Dragon_Skull_Flames_1
7. Wall_MTD_MAGE_Flames_1
8. Wall_MTD_MAGE_ICE_1
9. Wall_MTD_MAGE_Shock_1
10. Wall_MTD_Arvak_1
11. Wall_MTD_Miraak_1
12. Wall_MTD_Bear_1
13. Wall_MTD_Elk_1
14. Wall_MTD_Horker_1
15. Wall_MTD_Sabre_Cat_1
16. Wall_MTD_Wolf_1


Might add a Falmer or two, perhaps Skeleton Necro-Priest & a Troll or two in a future update.
Possibly a HD version.

Can be brought into the game by console command using: ~ TILDE
HELP \"WALL_MTD_\" OR HELP \"SHIELD_OF_\" & hitting Enter.

& using the desired Item Code Number returned in the above step in the formula:
Player.Additem XXXXXXXX 1  ENTER

Simply extract the main .zip file to your SkyRim Install directory ensuring the data Folder is 
merged with the original.

Leaving the House & returning is often a good 1st step in troubleshooting any problems 
experienced.
author: philbydorro
